pkmkdoc.description: DVDx InfoTool display the structure of a DVD-Video in different views: for DVD users with video, audio ans subtitles details; for DVD software developers with every details including VOB Cell addresses, discontinuity and much more.

choice.title: DVDinfo
choice.description: This pre-release uses libdvdread to get DVD informations from IFO files (VOB files aren't parsed and can even be absent from the VIDEO_TS folder). The libdvdread gives DVD and titles informations but not VTS (Video Title Set) data, the next version of DVDx InfoTool will compute VTS and PGC data to provide the VTS details with longest PGC which is more useful for DVD player or DVD ripper users.
